name: Mystery Mogu Mansion - Chapters 1 and 2
description:
Mystery Mogu Mansion - Chapters 1 and 2

Twitch's Most Based Ghost Vtuber,twitch.tv/mogu, has invited her very best mogChamp from her fanbase to enjoy a weekend at her mansion. However, when the mogChamp arrives, not everything is as it seems. Players of this visual novel are participating in the mystery of an afterlifetime, as they learn more about Mogu, in all her forms, and the hidden, dirty secrets of their dark pasts.

Featuring art from the Grand Mogster herself, this visual novel series is a bold exploration of Mogu's history as a streamer, a Mogster, and a woman. This interactive journey not only covers the lore of Mogu, but also introduces key details about her future...

For updates on this legendary series of Vtuber Narrative games, check out MoguGhost on Twitter, or catch her streams live on twitch.tv/mogu.
